txt.en: 'I will return to town.  Thank you!'
'You are terrific! Thanks for helping me.'
You have found Anurin tending to the wounded guards north of the village.

'I do not have time to talk, [placeholder]! There are wounded and sick guards everywhere. Lend me your aid and tend to a couple of them, then return to me when you are done.\n\n'Are you waiting for a sealed letter in the mail? Go!'
Wounded guards can be found along the northern lines of the Avanc-lûth.\n\nAnurin has asked you to patch up some guards and heal them quickly.
'Well done, Duvodiad. You have actually proven useful.
Anurin is at the northern lines of the Avanc-lûth.\n\nYou should return to Anurin and tell him that you have healed the guards.
TBD has asked you to tell the elders that they need more help at the front.
'There is no time to waste. Heal the injured guards with the supplies I gave you, then return when you are done.'
'Thank you.  Go tell the elders we need more help and fast.'
Talk to Anurin in the Dunbog
